name: I Hate You
description:
Is there anything you are afraid of? Everyone has their fears… Maybe snakes or disgusting spiders?
Don't fear anything. Join our army of avengers, meet your fears face to face and show them who's the boss.
Improve your death-maсhine, discover new enemies and get rid of your phobias.
Are you ready? So what are you waiting for? Download the game right now!
